thread.section_title: Luxy Hair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luxy Hair | www.luxyhair.com
thread.title: Shirl Contois
thread.title_full: Luxy Hair reviewed by Shirl Contois

author: Shirl Contois
title: Shirl Contois
text:
Everything about these hair extensions are perfect!! I feel amazing wearing them and cant believe the high quality for such a low price!! Luxy hair extensions has restored my confidence on every level!
I ordered the "On Dark Brown #2 - 20" (120g)", for thin hair and everything is seamless from root to tip! Honestly, I have tried tape-in, fusion tips, and micros but nothing compares to the quality and price point. I can look in the mirror and smile because I feel beautiful with my Luxy hair. I would recommend these hair extensions to anyone who is struggling with thinning hair or just needs a little confidence boost. These hair extensions are life changers.
